verses.verse: כִּ֤י <WH3588> ki If יִגְנֹֽב־ <WH1589> yig-nov- shall steal אִישׁ֙ <WH376> 'ish If a man שׁ֣וֹר <WH7794> Shor an ox אוֹ־ <WH176> 'ov- or שֶׂ֔ה <WH7716> Seh, or a sheep וּטְבָח֖וֹ <WH2873> u-te-va-Cho and kill א֣וֹ <WH176> o or מְכָר֑וֹ <WH4376> me-cha-Ro; it or sell חֲמִשָּׁ֣ה <WH2568> cha-mish-Shah five בָקָ֗ר <WH1241> va-Kar, oxen יְשַׁלֵּם֙ <WH7999> ye-shal-Lem it he shall restore תַּ֣חַת <WH8478> Ta-chat Thahash הַשּׁ֔וֹר <WH7794> hash-Shor, for an ox וְאַרְבַּע־ <WH702> ve-'ar-ba'- and four צֹ֖אן <WH6629> tzon sheep תַּ֥חַת <WH8478> Ta-chat Thahash הַשֶּֽׂה׃ <WH7716> has-Seh. for a sheep

אִם־ <WH518> 'im- If בַּמַּחְתֶּ֛רֶת <WH4290> bam-mach-Te-ret breaking up יִמָּצֵ֥א <WH4672> yim-ma-Tze be found הַגַּנָּ֖ב <WH1590> hag-gan-Nav If a thief וְהֻכָּ֣ה <WH5221> ve-huk-Kah and be smitten וָמֵ֑ת <WH4191> va-Met; that he die אֵ֥ין <WH369> 'ein there ל֖וֹ lo דָּמִֽים׃ <WH1818> da-Mim. [there shall] no blood

אִם־ <WH518> 'im- if זָרְחָ֥ה <WH2224> za-re-Chah be risen הַשֶּׁ֛מֶשׁ <WH8121> hash-She-mesh If the sun עָלָ֖יו <WH5921> 'a-Lav on דָּמִ֣ים <WH1818> da-Mim upon him [there shall be] blood ל֑וֹ lo; שַׁלֵּ֣ם <WH7999> shal-Lem [shed] for him [for] he should make full יְשַׁלֵּ֔ם <WH7999> ye-shal-Lem, restitution אִם־ <WH518> 'im- if אֵ֣ין <WH369> 'ein nothing ל֔וֹ lo, וְנִמְכַּ֖ר <WH4376> ve-nim-Kar if he have nothing then he shall be sold בִּגְנֵבָתֽוֹ׃ <WH1591> big-ne-va-To. for his theft

אִֽם־ <WH518> 'im- If הִמָּצֵא֩ <WH4672> him-ma-Tze be certainly תִמָּצֵ֨א <WH4672> tim-ma-Tze found בְיָד֜וֹ <WH3027> ve-ya-Do in his hand הַגְּנֵבָ֗ה <WH1591> hag-ge-ne-Vah, If the theft מִשּׁ֧וֹר <WH7794> mish-Shor whether it be ox עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- or חֲמ֛וֹר <WH2543> cha-Mor or ass עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- or שֶׂ֖ה <WH7716> seh or sheep חַיִּ֑ים <WH2416> chai-Yim; alive שְׁנַ֖יִם <WH8147> she-Na-yim double יְשַׁלֵּֽם׃ <WH7999> ye-shal-Lem. he shall restore ס sa-Mek

כִּ֤י <WH3588> ki If יַבְעֶר־ <WH1197> yav-'er- to be eaten אִישׁ֙ <WH376> 'ish If a man שָׂדֶ֣ה <WH7704> sa-Deh shall cause a field אוֹ־ <WH176> 'ov- or כֶ֔רֶם <WH3754> Che-rem, or vineyard וְשִׁלַּח֙ <WH7971> ve-shil-Lach and shall put אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- ; בְּעִירָה be-'i-rah כבְּעִירֹ֔ו <WH1165> be-'i-Ro, beast קוּבִעֵ֖ר <WH1197> u-vi-'Er and shall feed בִּשְׂדֵ֣ה <WH7704> bis-Deh field אַחֵ֑ר <WH312> 'a-Cher; in another man's מֵיטַ֥ב <WH4315> mei-Tav of the best שָׂדֵ֛הוּ <WH7704> sa-De-hu of his own field וּמֵיטַ֥ב <WH4315> u-mei-Tav and of the best כַּרְמ֖וֹ <WH3754> kar-Mo of his own vineyard יְשַׁלֵּֽם׃ <WH7999> ye-shal-Lem. shall he make restitution ס sa-Mek

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- If תֵצֵ֨א <WH3318> te-Tze break out אֵ֜שׁ <WH784> 'esh If fire וּמָצְאָ֤ה <WH4672> u-ma-tze-'Ah and catch קֹצִים֙ <WH6975> ko-Tzim in thorns וְנֶאֱכַ֣ל <WH398> ve-ne-'e-Chal be consumed גָּדִ֔ישׁ <WH1430> ga-Dish, so that the stacks of corn א֥וֹ <WH176> o or הַקָּמָ֖ה <WH7054> hak-ka-Mah or the standing corn א֣וֹ <WH176> o or הַשָּׂדֶ֑ה <WH7704> has-sa-Deh; or the field שַׁלֵּ֣ם <WH7999> shal-Lem shall surely יְשַׁלֵּ֔ם <WH7999> ye-shal-Lem, make restitution הַמַּבְעִ֖ר <WH1197> ham-mav-'Ir [therewith] he that kindled אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַבְּעֵרָֽה׃ <WH1200> hab-be-'e-Rah. the fire ס sa-Mek

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- If יִתֵּן֩ <WH5414> yit-Ten shall deliver אִ֨ישׁ <WH376> 'ish If a man אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- about רֵעֵ֜הוּ <WH7453> re-'E-hu unto his neighbour כֶּ֤סֶף <WH3701> Ke-sef money אֽוֹ־ <WH176> 'ov- or כֵלִים֙ <WH3627> che-Lim or stuff לִשְׁמֹ֔ר <WH8104> lish-Mor, to keep וְגֻנַּ֖ב <WH1589> ve-gun-Nav and it be stolen מִבֵּ֣ית <WH1004> mib-Beit house הָאִ֑ישׁ <WH376> ha-'Ish; out of the man's אִם־ <WH518> 'im- if יִמָּצֵ֥א <WH4672> yim-ma-Tze be found הַגַּנָּ֖ב <WH1590> hag-gan-Nav if the thief יְשַׁלֵּ֥ם <WH7999> ye-shal-Lem let him pay שְׁנָֽיִם׃ <WH8147> she-Na-yim. double

אִם־ <WH518> 'im- If לֹ֤א <WH3808> lo be not יִמָּצֵא֙ <WH4672> yim-ma-Tze found הַגַּנָּ֔ב <WH1590> hag-gan-Nav, If the thief וְנִקְרַ֥ב <WH7126> ve-nik-Rav shall be brought בַּֽעַל־ <WH1167> ba-'al- then the master הַבַּ֖יִת <WH1004> hab-Ba-yit of the house אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- before הָֽאֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> ha-'E-lo-Him; unto the judges אִם־ <WH518> 'im- If לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo not שָׁלַ֛ח <WH7971> sha-Lach [to see] whether he have put יָד֖וֹ <WH3027> ya-Do his hand בִּמְלֶ֥אכֶת <WH4399> bim-Le-chet goods רֵעֵֽהוּ׃ <WH7453> re-'E-hu. unto his neighbour's

עַֽל־ <WH5921> 'al- For כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- every דְּבַר־ <WH1697> de-var- For all manner פֶּ֡שַׁע <WH6588> Pe-sha' of trespass עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- for שׁ֡וֹר <WH7794> Shor [whether it be] for ox עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- for חֲ֠מוֹר <WH2543> Cha-mor for ass עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- for שֶׂ֨ה <WH7716> seh for sheep עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- for שַׂלְמָ֜ה <WH8008> sal-Mah for raiment עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- for כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- any אֲבֵדָ֗ה <WH9> 'a-ve-Dah, [or] for any manner of lost thing אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which יֹאמַר֙ <WH559> yo-Mar which [another] challengeth כִּי־ <WH3588> ki- for ה֣וּא <WH1931> hu he זֶ֔ה <WH2088> Zeh, This עַ֚ד <WH5704> 'ad before הָֽאֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> ha-'E-lo-Him, before the judges יָבֹ֖א <WH935> ya-Vo shall come דְּבַר־ <WH1697> de-var- to be his the cause שְׁנֵיהֶ֑ם <WH8147> she-nei-Hem; of both parties אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> 'a-Sher whom יַרְשִׁיעֻן֙ <WH7561> yar-shi-'Un shall condemn אֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> E-lo-Him, [and] whom the judges יְשַׁלֵּ֥ם <WH7999> ye-shal-Lem he shall pay שְׁנַ֖יִם <WH8147> she-Na-yim double לְרֵעֵֽהוּ׃ <WH7453> le-re-'E-hu. unto his neighbour ס sa-Mek

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- If יִתֵּן֩ <WH5414> yit-Ten deliver אִ֨ישׁ <WH376> 'ish If a man אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- about רֵעֵ֜הוּ <WH7453> re-'E-hu unto his neighbour חֲמ֨וֹר <WH2543> cha-Mor an ass אוֹ־ <WH176> 'ov- or שׁ֥וֹר <WH7794> Shor or an ox אוֹ־ <WH176> 'ov- or שֶׂ֛ה <WH7716> seh or a sheep וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol any בְּהֵמָ֖ה <WH929> be-he-Mah or any beast לִשְׁמֹ֑ר <WH8104> lish-Mor; to keep וּמֵ֛ת <WH4191> u-Met and it die אוֹ־ <WH176> 'ov- or נִשְׁבַּ֥ר <WH7665> nish-Bar or be hurt אוֹ־ <WH176> 'ov- or נִשְׁבָּ֖ה <WH7617> nish-Bah or driven away אֵ֥ין <WH369> 'ein no רֹאֶֽה׃ <WH7200> ro-'Eh. no man seeing

שְׁבֻעַ֣ת <WH7621> she-vu-'At [Then] shall an oath יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD תִּהְיֶה֙ <WH1961> tih-Yeh shall be made בֵּ֣ין <WH996> bein by שְׁנֵיהֶ֔ם <WH8147> she-nei-Hem, be between them both אִם־ <WH518> 'im- lo לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo has not שָׁלַ֛ח <WH7971> sha-Lach that he hath not put יָד֖וֹ <WH3027> ya-Do his hand בִּמְלֶ֣אכֶת <WH4399> bim-Le-chet goods רֵעֵ֑הוּ <WH7453> re-'E-hu; unto his neighbour's וְלָקַ֥ח <WH3947> ve-la-Kach of it shall accept בְּעָלָ֖יו <WH1167> be-'a-Lav and the owner וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> ve-Lo shall not יְשַׁלֵּֽם׃ <WH7999> ye-shal-Lem. [thereof] and he shall not make [it] good

וְאִם־ <WH518> ve-'im- if גָּנֹ֥ב <WH1589> ga-No is actually יִגָּנֵ֖ב <WH1589> yig-ga-Nev stolen מֵעִמּ֑וֹ <WH5973> me-'im-Mo; with יְשַׁלֵּ֖ם <WH7999> ye-shal-Lem from him he shall make restitution לִבְעָלָֽיו׃ <WH1167> liv-'a-Lav. unto the owner

אִם־ <WH518> 'im- If טָרֹ֥ף <WH2963> ta-Rof torn יִטָּרֵ֖ף <WH2963> yit-ta-Ref to pieces יְבִאֵ֣הוּ <WH935> ye-vi-'E-hu [then] let him bring עֵ֑ד <WH5707> 'Ed; it [for] witness הַטְּרֵפָ֖ה <WH2966> hat-te-re-Fah that which was torn לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo shall not יְשַׁלֵּֽם׃ <WH7999> ye-shal-Lem. [and] he shall not make good פ Peh

וְכִֽי־ <WH3588> ve-chi- If יִשְׁאַ֥ל <WH7592> yish-'Al borrow אִ֛ישׁ <WH376> 'ish And if a man מֵעִ֥ם <WH5973> me-'Im thereof [being] not with it רֵעֵ֖הוּ <WH7453> re-'E-hu [ought] of his neighbour וְנִשְׁבַּ֣ר <WH7665> ve-nish-Bar and it be hurt אוֹ־ <WH176> 'ov- or מֵ֑ת <WH4191> Met; or die בְּעָלָ֥יו <WH1167> be-'a-Lav the owner אֵין־ <WH369> 'ein- else עִמּ֖וֹ <WH5973> im-Mo with שַׁלֵּ֥ם <WH7999> shal-Lem he shall surely יְשַׁלֵּֽם׃ <WH7999> ye-shal-Lem. make [it] good

אִם־ <WH518> 'im- If בְּעָלָ֥יו <WH1167> be-'a-Lav [But] if the owner עִמּ֖וֹ <WH5973> im-Mo with לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo shall not יְשַׁלֵּ֑ם <WH7999> ye-shal-Lem; thereof [be] with it he shall not make [it] good אִם־ <WH518> 'im- if שָׂכִ֣יר <WH7916> sa-Chir if it [be] an hired ה֔וּא <WH1931> Hu, it בָּ֖א <WH935> ba [thing] it came בִּשְׂכָרֽוֹ׃ <WH7939> bis-cha-Ro. for his hire ס sa-Mek

וְכִֽי־ <WH3588> ve-chi- If יְפַתֶּ֣ה <WH6601> ye-fat-Teh entice אִ֗ישׁ <WH376> 'Ish, And if a man בְּתוּלָ֛ה <WH1330> be-tu-Lah a maid אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- is not אֹרָ֖שָׂה <WH781> 'o-Ra-sah that is not betrothed וְשָׁכַ֣ב <WH7901> ve-sha-Chav and lie עִמָּ֑הּ <WH5973> 'im-Mah; must מָהֹ֛ר <WH4117> ma-Hor with her he shall surely יִמְהָרֶ֥נָּה <WH4117> yim-ha-Ren-nah endow לּ֖וֹ lo לְאִשָּֽׁה׃ <WH802> le-'ish-Shah. her to be his wife

אִם־ <WH518> 'im- If מָאֵ֧ן <WH3985> ma-'En utterly יְמָאֵ֛ן <WH3985> ye-ma-'En refuse אָבִ֖יהָ <WH1> 'a-Vi-ha If her father לְתִתָּ֣הּ <WH5414> le-tit-Tah to give ל֑וֹ lo; כֶּ֣סֶף <WH3701> Ke-sef money יִשְׁקֹ֔ל <WH8254> yish-Kol, her unto him he shall pay כְּמֹ֖הַר <WH4119> ke-Mo-har according to the dowry הַבְּתוּלֹֽת׃ <WH1330> hab-be-tu-Lot. of virgins ס sa-Mek
מְכַשֵּׁפָ֖ה <WH3784> me-chash-she-Fah Thou shalt not suffer a witch לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo not תְחַיֶּֽה׃ <WH2421> te-chai-Yeh. to live ס sa-Mek

כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- Whoever שֹׁכֵ֥ב <WH7901> sho-Chev Whosoever lieth עִם־ <WH5973> 'im- with בְּהֵמָ֖ה <WH929> be-he-Mah with a beast מ֥וֹת <WH4191> Mot shall surely יוּמָֽת׃ <WH4191> yu-Mat. be put to death ס sa-Mek

זֹבֵ֥חַ <WH2076> zo-Ve-ach He that sacrificeth לָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> la-'E-lo-Him unto [any] god יָֽחֳרָ֑ם <WH2763> yo-cho-Ram; only he shall be utterly destroyed בִּלְתִּ֥י <WH1115> bil-Ti save לַיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh unto the LORD לְבַדּֽוֹ׃ <WH905> le-vad-Do. alone

וְגֵ֥ר <WH1616> ve-Ger a stranger לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- shall not תוֹנֶ֖ה <WH3238> to-Neh Thou shalt neither vex וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> ve-Lo or תִלְחָצֶ֑נּוּ <WH3905> til-cha-Tzen-nu; nor oppress כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for גֵרִ֥ים <WH1616> ge-Rim him for ye were strangers הֱיִיתֶ֖ם <WH1961> he-yi-Tem become בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> be-'E-retz in the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> mitz-Ra-yim. of Egypt
כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- any אַלְמָנָ֥ה <WH490> 'al-ma-Nah any widow וְיָת֖וֹם <WH3490> ve-ya-Tom or fatherless child לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo shall not תְעַנּֽוּן׃ <WH6031> te-'an-Nun. Ye shall not afflict

אִם־ <WH518> 'im- If עַנֵּ֥ה <WH6031> 'an-Neh thou afflict תְעַנֶּ֖ה <WH6031> te-'an-Neh them in any wise אֹת֑וֹ <WH853> o-To; כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki for אִם־ <WH518> 'im- if צָעֹ֤ק <WH6817> tza-'Ok and they cry יִצְעַק֙ <WH6817> yitz-'Ak at all אֵלַ֔י <WH413> 'e-Lai, to שָׁמֹ֥עַ <WH8085> sha-Mo-a' unto me I will surely אֶשְׁמַ֖ע <WH8085> 'esh-Ma' hear צַעֲקָתֽוֹ׃ <WH6818> tza-'a-ka-To. their cry

וְחָרָ֣ה <WH2734> ve-cha-Rah shall wax hot אַפִּ֔י <WH639> 'ap-Pi, And my wrath וְהָרַגְתִּ֥י <WH2026> ve-ha-rag-Ti and I will kill אֶתְכֶ֖ם <WH853> 'et-Chem בֶּחָ֑רֶב <WH2719> be-Cha-rev; you with the sword וְהָי֤וּ <WH1961> ve-ha-Yu shall become נְשֵׁיכֶם֙ <WH802> ne-shei-Chem and your wives אַלְמָנ֔וֹת <WH490> al-ma-Not, shall be widows וּבְנֵיכֶ֖ם <WH1121> u-ve-nei-Chem and your children יְתֹמִֽים׃ <WH3490> ye-to-Mim. fatherless פ Peh
